DDL:
CREATE TABLE interest_map (
    id INTEGER,
    interest_name TEXT,
    interest_summary TEXT,
    created_at TEXT,
    last_modified TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE interest_metrics (
    _month VARCHAR(4),
    _year VARCHAR(4),
    month_year VARCHAR(7),
    interest_id VARCHAR(5),
    composition REAL,
    index_value REAL,
    ranking INTEGER,
    percentile_ranking REAL
);
